mapper.sql: id, index_number, index_title, index_content, parent_id, sort, create_user_id, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_date, `status`
mapper.insert: insert into sys_index (id, index_number, index_title, index_content, parent_id, sort, create_user_id, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_date, `status`) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,

mapper.update:
update sys_index
index_number = #{indexNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
index_title = #{indexTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
index_content = #{indexContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_index set index_number = #{indexNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, index_title = #{indexTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, index_content = #{indexContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from sys_index where sys_index.index_number=#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by sys_index.create_date asc limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_index (id, index_number, index_title, index_content, parent_id, sort, create_user_id, create_date, modify_user_id, modify_date, `status`) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.indexNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.indexTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.indexContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select a.evaluation_value, b.* from ( select index_id,evaluation_value from index_point.map_student_evaluation where student_work_id = #{studentWorkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and course_select_number = #{courseSelectNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) a left join index_point.sys_index b on a.index_id = b.id
